banner.title: Aiqia customer service
banner.subTitle1: New generation intelligent customer service system
banner.tips1: Focus on overseas, global deployment, serve many overseas enterprises, and gain unanimous praise!
banner.tips2: Bring you: convenient, safe, efficient and stable use experience!

banner.title: All round ultimate experience
banner.subTitle1: Multi platform integrated management, efficient and intelligent AI customer service, extreme user experience, and minimalist interactive settings
banner.tips1: On the premise of meeting the multi-functional layout of customer service, we will try our best to reduce user learning costs.
banner.tips2: Provide an efficient and simple experience!

banner.title: Security and stability are our purposes
banner.subTitle1: We have a special CDN team to ensure the safety and stability of the system

banner.title: Internationalization, global layout
banner.subTitle1: Aiqia customer service system supports multi languages and global communication is barrier free!

feature.buildDesc: The new generation of customer service software, online customer service in different languages to help enterprises solve communication problems, the system provides a variety of reception modes. Common words, quick picture transmission, quick reply, message reminder, quick response to customer inquiries! Support system sorting, visitor priority assignment, 7 * 24 hours online robot customer service, automatic reception of intelligent customer service, and assist customer service transformation
feature.simpleDesc: You only need a few simple steps to make your website have customer service function and provide the best service for your members. The system integrates multiple website platforms, which can distribute management at the same time, improve efficiency and reduce costs.
feature.privateInfo: Focus on overseas / safety and stability
feature.privateDesc: The proprietary CDN team operates independently and adopts high-level CDN. More than 10 defense nodes around the world realize distributed defense, providing protection for your business against malicious attacks and making it operate safely and stably. Aicha has served many enterprises and has deep cooperation to help them grow!

tip.info: Using Aicha can make your enterprise get twice the result with half the effort
tip.desc: Aicha customer service solution provides a complete customer service cloud product solution. Enterprises can choose the most appropriate way to access Aicha according to their own enterprise size, so that enterprises can be more efficient

funcDetail.chatDesc1: Customer service supports mobile terminal /app/pc terminal operation, sending messages quickly and stably, and customer service can connect to multiple platforms at the same time. The dialog supports the uploading of various files, pictures and videos, quick screenshots, and the sending of quick words and quick picture expressions. Support conversational forms such as transfer, group chat and technical support. Multiple language pages can be selected to support night and day mode conversion.
funcDetail.chatDesc2: Pictures can be added to the message, and screenshots can be pasted and sent. On the mobile phone, customers can take photos in real time and send them to customer service. When using Aicha customer service, customer service can directly send text and graphic messages to customer service.
funcDetail.manageDesc1: Aicha customer service integrates the latest intelligent customer service system.
funcDetail.manageDesc2: A large number of samples, machine learning, intelligent dialogue system, automatic answer customer service system, based on keyword calculation, push the most accurate reply, robot customer service intelligent capture messages, obtain a large number of reply samples, and build an accurate dialogue model.
funcDetail.reportDesc1: Aicha customer service background management supports super administrators to perform various operations such as customer service grouping, customer service allocation, customer service quality inspection, customer service data query, historical dialog query and customer service settings.
funcDetail.reportDesc2: The customer service workbench enters the customer service operation, information isolation, and data security.
funcDetail.reportDesc4: Visitor geographical statistics, convenient and efficient to help enterprises conduct customer information portrait and user analysis
funcDetail.dataDesc1: The professional team manages data security and ensures the stable work of enterprise customer service.
funcDetail.dataDesc2: Google secondary authentication login can be enabled to improve account security.
funcDetail.dataDesc3: The management and customer service login separately to avoid the loss of customer information.
funcDetail.dataDesc4: Blacklist management to avoid abnormal information.
funcDetail.dataDesc5: The whole use or trial process is confidential, and there is no third-party program.
funcDetail.tranInfo2: Visitors become customers, and transformation is more efficient
funcDetail.tranDesc1: Intelligent customer service comprehensively analyzes page visits, visits, conversations, messages, etc.
funcDetail.tranDesc2: Grasp the working data of intelligent customer service in real time and quantify the employees' business ability
funcDetail.tranDesc3: Master the visitor region and visitor information, and improve the customer conversion rate.

step1.tips: Please scan the QR code and install Google verifier. If you have already installed it, please go to the next step

step2.tips: Please use Google verifier to scan the QR code below. After success, you will get a 6-digit dual verification code, which changes every 30 seconds.
step2.desc1: If the code scanning fails, please input the above key to the verifier. You need to set an account, for example: xxx@DigFinex (fill in your mobile phone / email account or your nickname at XXX).
step2.desc2: I already have a 6-digit double verification code

step3.label: Double verification code
step3.placeholder: Please enter the double verification code
